response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and sell personal data, highlighting the concern for privacy and security in the digital age. the use of hashtags such as #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #security (security) allows the post to reach a wider audience and connect with others who are also concerned about this issue.
